title: The Half Windsor Knot
description: The Half Windsor tie knot is a versatile, symmetrical knot best for light to medium weight fabrics like cotton, silk, linen and knit. Follow these steps to tie a tie with a Half Windsor knot.
pageTitle: How to Tie a Tie: Half Windsor Knot
